title: Return To Dead City
description: Librarian note: alternative-cover edition of B008EDIT2Q."A ferocious, action-packed tour de force that will leave you breathless."New York City holds painful memories for Chris Collins and he never intended going back there. But when his daughter is captured and is due to be thrown to the zombies in a sadistic TV extravaganza, Chris is spurred into action.Now he's going back to Dead City to challenge his old nemesis Bronson Chavez, the one-time street thug who is now mayor of New York. Only one of them will survive and Chris has the odds seriously stacked against him.From the zombie-infested streets of Queens, to the zombie-sex and other entertainments of Times Square to the sick 'Zombie survivor' spectacle in Central Park, Return To Dead City will keep you glued to your Kindle late into the night.
author: J.J. Zep
